alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:20PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Dale and northern Coffee Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 319 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Elba to near Ariton to 7 miles southeast of Doster. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ozark, Fort Rucker, Ariton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Bells Crossroads, Dill, Lowry Mill, Arguta, Snells Crossroads, Wise Mill, Roeton, Dale County Lake, Marley Hill, Clowers Crossroads, Phillips Crossroads, Arcus, Hwy 231 Pea River Bridge, Jack and Java. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
